title: Ep 11 | USA Women’s Soccer, God’s Approval of Hunting, and the Dinosaur Theory
description:
What does God think of hunting? Is the women's soccer kneel worse than the NFL kneel? Were there dinosaurs on the ark? Find out this week on Unashamed.

See episodes of "Unashamed with Phil Robertson": https://bit.ly/2J4XsiX

 

See clips from Phil's TV show "In the Woods with Phil": https://bit.ly/2PNM6k1

 

To take a FREE 30 Day Trial of Phil's TV show and the rest of BlazeTV: https://www.BlazeTV.com/Phil
